website_summaries.verdict: Minor issues aside, they are an attractive pair of cross trainers built for warm-ups and light exercise, or for looking stylish with your favorite casual wear.
pros: Ideal for men who want lightweight shoes that are ideal for working out and walking, as they have durable, supportive soles
cons: Some men reported adding separate insoles to make up for the subpar ones that come with the shoes

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe; styleish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Shoes came in today and fit as expected. They were packaged nicely and had no imperfections that I could see. The shoes were very comfortable; even without breaking them in. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby G.

customer_reviews.title: The best thing about this shoe is that it is slightly ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoe size fit perfectly to what I expected. The best thing about this shoe is that it is slightly deeper than most low top athletic shoes. I always add an additional orthotic to all my shoes. Low tops are generally too shallow making the top edge of the shoe ride high on my heel when adding an orthotic. These fit perfectly on my heel with the orthotic insert. Very sturdy shoes which is what I prefer over a fabric mesh type shoe. For these reasons Puma in now my go to brand for athletic footwear.
customer_reviews.author: larry v.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic feel
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th pair of puma shoes. With each pair I buy the quality continues to drop. These shoes feel like cheap plastic shoes you would buy at a big box store. I don’t anticipate them lasting more than a month or 2. The memory foam sole is comfortable at first. But wears out after a few wears. This will be my last pair of puma shoes
customer_reviews.author: moe

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe... just no arch support
customer_reviews.text: No arch support in my opinion... I've mostly worn Nike over my many years as they just fit my feet best. I caught these on sale and thought they looked nice with a cool color combination... which they do. However, after trying them on for 5 minutes I just knew the lack of arch support was going to mean they would just sit in my closet after being worn once... thus they got returned. If you have very flat feet with no need for arch support, these shoes might be a completely different story for you. It just depends on who's going to be wearing them...
customer_reviews.author: B.B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and quality
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend these shoes they are comfortable and they look great. They're very good quality and not cheaply made. I would have bought a second pair but they didn't have the color I wanted in my size. I will be checking back to see if my size is available.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: nice looking sneakers, order a size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Great sneakers for every day use, train, work. i realy like how they look. Do yourself a favor an order a half size bigger. I have a regular fit and i believe puma made a mistake and didn't label those shoes as narrow fit. all the puma and nike that have this design have the same problem. ordered also a cell surin premium half size bigger and they fit perfectly. read other reviews you won't regret the decision. the day puma fixes this i will give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rivky Hafter

customer_reviews.title: Cushiony Sole!
customer_reviews.text: The soles are very cushioned and conform well to my feet. My only issue is that the top part near the toe rubs my last 2 toes on the right foot. No issues with the left shoe and I haven't had this issue with other shoes (including Pumas) that I've worn in the past. I'm hoping that it's just a "breaking in" issue and that it will subside once I've worn them enough. If not for the rubbing issue, these would be a 5 star shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Norville

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, vut a good shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10 and ordered an 11 based on prior history of sizes running a little small. A 11.5 would have been better. Nice shoe though. Needs a little breaking in because it is a heavier material. 1/12/2018 update:. Upgrading to 5*...very solid construction...I rotate my shoes, but it is my favorite now over my Nike, UA, addidas.
customer_reviews.author: R.Syling

customer_reviews.title: Buy One Full Size Larger
customer_reviews.text: Buy a size larger solves length issue but shoe is narrow, needs to be made wider. So many people complain about this, I have to think that this wasnt measured for American feet.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S

customer_reviews.title: UODATE: Tight! (And now Kaput!)
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I wore these shoes for less than 3 months and they are done! Wore hole clean through them. These shoes are not good quality. I ordered a half size larger (11.5) than my normal size (11) and the shoe is still very tight. Particularly tight across the wide part of the front of the foot and the toe box. I wouldn’t want to go to a size 12 because the length gets too long. Arch support seems good (I have very flat feet). The shoes look great! I’m hoping I can actually wear them. I’m trying to stretch them out.
customer_reviews.author: Charles C. Greene

customer_reviews.title: They may need to be stretched out or get a size higher than normal.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes. They were really tight when I got them though. I'm a size 14 and for the first time I felt I needed a size 15 for this shoe. The highest they go up to is 14 so that's not happening. I stretched the shoe out so its fine now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and are comfortable. My wide feet are a little cramp some ...
customer_reviews.text: They fit well, and are comfortable. My wide feet are a little cramp some times, and my pinky toes hurt after wear, though I expect that to change once I get them properly broken in.
customer_reviews.author: James Havard

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for the money!
customer_reviews.text: These Pumas, as others have stated, do have a tight toe box. However, I was able to stretch the toe box by stuffing a tennis ball into the toe box of each shoe and leaving them in overnight. ( I've used this method successfully in other shoes too). Now the shoes fit well. I have high arches so I use orthotic inserts in many shoes. I have not tried these without them yet. As far as looks go, I certainly can't complain at all. These Pumas are very nice looking shoes. The silver accents are just enough to break up the blahs of an all black shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Wineracquet

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised the in-sole is extremely soft and comfortable. Fit overall is perfect. The best sneakers I ever owned was PUMA. I love these. I had to send the first pair back, although my normal size 11, turns out fit was too snug, i had to re-order size 11.5" . . . and they fit PERFECTLY. Original ordering info said order normal size , but that was not true for me. Also, my re-order cost me more than the original special price . . . this was my first-ever RETURN and i had to learn the expensive way that there is no actual 'exchange'. Overall, the size 11.5" is comfy/perfect.
customer_reviews.author: T. Fred Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great-looking shoe, but runs small
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive shoe. I bought it as a casual shoe, not for athletics. It runs AT LEAST one-half size too small. I ordered an 11 but had to exchange it for an 11.5, which is still a little snug. The sole is hard but thin. I'm wondering how long it will last. Anyhow, beautiful shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C.

customer_reviews.title: I do not like the feeling of unstable ground when I wear them
customer_reviews.text: Look very stylish and as they are depicted in the images. I do not like the feeling of unstable ground when I wear them. It is like the bottom of your shoes has more than one level. Anyway, maybe I have not worn such shoes before. Materials are not of high quality, but they are suffice for the price. To resume, I would recommend ordering 0.5 size larger for your safety. The sneakers are good if you want to wear inexpensive pumas)
customer_reviews.author: Mher

customer_reviews.title: Horribly uncomfortable, but nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the design and appearance. Hated the sole and rigidity of the shoe. Felt like I was buckling on metal boots. Parts hit the sides of my ankle and the material was so hard it literally hurt to wear them. The sole felt uneven and super flat with absolutely no cushion. Great looking shoe, but the most uncomfortable shoe I've even worn. Returned them right away.
customer_reviews.author: kanine2112

customer_reviews.title: Puma shoes
customer_reviews.text: Just got these a few days ago, comfortable, wore them all day at a car show, with no aches or pains nor pinching the toes while walking, besides they look good wasn't a fan before just because but now looking forward to more with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ammon

customer_reviews.title: Good pair, not for summer use though.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. Fit well. This particular pair does not breath to well. The other pair (pumas) breath fine, but these are different so my feet will warm up even with thin Sox on. It does not cause discomfort, but it is noticeable. Great during the winter, not so good for the summer
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Idky but these Puma’s are a size off?? So order a size bigger.
customer_reviews.text: Thank God I red the reviews before I ordered them cuz I would have never thought to order a size bigger. Some said half size bigger but Men should order a whole size bigger to be safe. The foam inserts in these shoes are amazing. Feel like walking on air it really does. Bought for the gym and very happy..
customer_reviews.author: Papi Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little small!
customer_reviews.text: I think these definitely run a little smaller than your regular size shoes; I would definitely order at least a half size up. These are snug, but super comfortable otherwise. I will definitely order them again, a half size larger. Plus they just look so darn cool!
customer_reviews.author: thejeepguy

customer_reviews.title: NIce shoe, but needs to be broken in
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking shoe and comfortable once broken in, however the first week of wearing this shoe was unbearably painful on my little toe. Never had that issue with any of my other 9.5 puma shoes so I am sure its a design flaw. There seems to be some stitching at the tip of the shoe that rubs on your little toe. Had to stuff the top of the shoe with paper for a couple days to stretch it out and then the shoe was wearable.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl H

customer_reviews.title: I like the minimalism.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look. I have really high arches, some support it there when I stretch my foot b4 putting the on. My only frown is that that run a little tight. I think half a size up would have been great. They're still new so hoping breaking them in more will making them even better.
customer_reviews.author: Alex82

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, but snug fit so if you have a wide foot might not fit well. I had to by a half size bigger and they are still tight.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the same size and there useless. I can't wear them more the 30 minutes ...
customer_reviews.text: I had bought these a year ago and fit surprisingly well. I ordered the same size and there useless. I can't wear them more the 30 minutes with out wanting to throw them away. There like new and I hoping that I ll find someone who can wear them . I won't be ordering any more puma shoes from this site .
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it.... It is just perfect 👌 😍 They sell what they show..... I really appreciate .....
customer_reviews.author: Vilas C.

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My son found these shoes at Famous Footwear. I was reluctant to spend $70 on a pair of shoes for a 13-year old (I don’t spend that on myself!) but this was truly a treat but even so I did my due diligence and found the exact shoe for about 40% less than the store price!! A big win-win for us both. Shoes fit perfectly though it did help that he did try them on at the store first. Nonetheless it all couldn’t have worked out any better than it did. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn B.

customer_reviews.title: Not a normal Puma... this one sucks!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't wear these shoes for awhile after they arrived... turned out to be a bad choice. Around the third time I wore them one of the lace eyelet broke (I mean tore clean through while pulling the laces tight). Of course the return window is closed and I can't figure out how to return a defective product. This sucks monkey butt! I never spend this much on shoes and now I have to throw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The ACDC of shoes
customer_reviews.text: You have to have confidence in your shoes to finish anything. My favorite shoes of all time. Used for Indoor Soccer, Fitness training, Marathons, and just to look good. Very comfortable shoes. To each is there own. My old pumas held up for years and were sentimental to me but the smell........! 👍🏻👍🏼👍👍🏾👍🏿 Do not tell anyone, this is this the best shoe. I mean it not a word.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Brisbane

customer_reviews.title: Run small!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look and solid feel of these shoes. However, I ordered the size I have worn for many years and they were so small, my feet instantly hurt and my toes were scrunched from the tips and sides.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Fit, looks, comfort A+
customer_reviews.text: I was lucky to try these on at a local store in the past so I new what size to order. They were a little tight in the beginning but have stretched nicely. I wear them daily for work and have had zero issues. They feel great and my feet don’t hurt nearly as bad as before. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Myers

customer_reviews.title: Solid Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I found that this is a solid shoe. For me, it’s a little narrow through the toes but just right everywhere else. I have found that a lot of PUMA shoes are undersized in length but this show surprised me! There’s decent support through the heel where I have had issues. The shoe itself fits like a glove and it gives better feel than the New Balance I switched from. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus Roberts

customer_reviews.title: It's quite the head turner and you will get a good amount of complements.
customer_reviews.text: Head Turner, comfortable, surprisingly light. Shipping was fast and the quality is great. Would buy again. Thank you! Size runs kind of adjusted, for a more accurate fit order a number larger than your normal size for a comfortable fit. I.e. I wear normally a US size 10 and I ordered a size 10.5 just to be on the safe side. I wished I ordered a size 11. They do fit ok but they feel just about right a bit adjusted on the front of the shoe like a pointy cowboy boot.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Great looking comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These are great every day wear tenny’s. I bought a pair about three years ago on a whim because they were on sale and they became my favorite pair. Really good looking and comfortable shoes. This new pair meets the expectations I had for them. Same quality and comfort. I bought a pair of Tazon’s before these, and I definitely like the Cell Surin’s better.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Heitke

customer_reviews.title: Proper size Puma shoes
customer_reviews.text: Finally a pair of Puma shoes that actually fit correctly. I went through 4 different that were either to small or to large. I love the colors and look of this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: RonnieJohn

customer_reviews.title: Great look, runs small
customer_reviews.text: Love Puma, great looking, solid feel, just plan to purchase a larger size next time. These run SUPER tight. I wear a 12, will definitely grab a 13 next time. Other than that I get complemented on them constantly, definitely a head turner.
customer_reviews.author: Str3tch

customer_reviews.title: I like it but I returned it because the size which ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it but I returned it because the size which is my size for my old ones was smaller so. My old ones are 8.5 but these shoes I have to order 9, 1/2 more for my regular size.
customer_reviews.author: Jcmak

customer_reviews.title: I was going to return these cause they felt a little tight
customer_reviews.text: These felt a little tight but after walking in them a few days fits very well...I'm guessing just a little break in was all that was needed.. I luv the shoes now...
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I would not recommend this shoe for cross-training or running, or anything other than casual wear despite the description. There is not a lot of cushion, support or comfort for athletic purposes, but the shoe looks great. They are made to last, easy to clean and hold up well. This is my third pair of these shoes and I will probably buy a fourth.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Stay clean easy to clean comfortable is 6 out of 10
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes but different type of fit they fit good comfortable stay clean easy clean but the fit is different gotta get used to them. But they look great with any outfit worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Whitehouse Intuitive Sales 360

customer_reviews.title: They run small...
customer_reviews.text: I returned the 11.5 M for a 11.5 w and the second pair fit perfectly. The shoes are great and comfortable. Once i got the right size, I was happy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Deane

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product. Is a little more expensive than the other puma shoes but the material is worth it. The out side material is easy to clean. I'm a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Meneses

customer_reviews.title: Only with people with very narrow feet and low instep.
customer_reviews.text: I have never had issues of any PUMA shoes being too narrow because my feet are narrow as well. That is why I prefer PUMA over other shoes. However, this pair is too narrow around the knuckles area. Or, I probably could say "too low" because my feet started to hurt towards the front of the instep area. It could be that the shoes are still too new and need to break them in first.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben B.

customer_reviews.title: Always superior
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is on his feet at work and he will only wear these. He says they are the only shoes that don't make his feet hurt after half a day.
customer_reviews.author: Dara M

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really like these sneakers, they are extremely comfortable, and can be worn all day without any issues. The workmanship is also excellent, this is the third pair I have ordered on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Bmw328i

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We saw these shoes at a store and they didn't have my husband's size. Found them on her and they were cheaper. Look just like the photo. They fit great and he loves how they feel.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Braun

customer_reviews.title: Ok shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These popped up in my search for leather puma sneakers. For the price they seemed like a great buy. They are not leather. More vinyl than plastic, but they don’t breathe the way I had hoped. They fit well, but get sweaty. I do like the way they look so wear them often.
customer_reviews.author: Rob G.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes! 8 1/2 is exactly 8 1/2.
customer_reviews.text: My shoes arrived on time as promised and are perfect. Somehow Amazon thinks my package was lost. It was not but I can't figure out how to tell them other than not requesting the refund they offered. I am as happy as a clam at high tide.
customer_reviews.author: Frank J. Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Finishing
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are attractively styled but this pair was poorly assembled. Material around the heel was wrinkled and loose instead of smooth and taut. The insteps have big creases and push out where the soft material meets the stiffer Puma swoosh detail. The Turin’s that I bought these to replace were far better quality and have lasted five years. I will be returning these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: On the fence
customer_reviews.text: The back of this shoe doesn't seem to come up high enough and my heel seems to slip out often. Bur it's a nice looking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Top Rock

customer_reviews.title: shoes were too tight for my son, had to ...
customer_reviews.text: shoes were too tight for my son, had to return. I also ordered red and gray as shown in picture but the shoes were florescent orange and gray.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sneaker. Comfortable from day one and very sharp ...
customer_reviews.text: Been a Nike fan for years but for some reason, my white nike sneaks, 2 pairs now, don't ever seem to break in. Uncomfortable to say the least. Wore Puma back in the day so decided to give these a try. Awesome sneaker. Comfortable from day one and very sharp looking. They hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Joe K

customer_reviews.title: My favorite brand... 😊
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this vrand of shoes. They seem to last me a very long time. Lol. Finally a shoe that doesnt make my long and narrow feet look like boat meant for water. // The seller is awesome as these are authentic, untouched, and true to photos. // I will be buying more. As I am trying to collect them all like Pokemon!
customer_reviews.author: Exp Alley

customer_reviews.title: The shoe looks great, but the width is somewhat narrow
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks great, but the width is somewhat narrow, so it feels like I should have bought a half size larger. Wish i coukd return and get a bigger size
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: when ordering always best to get a half size larger
customer_reviews.text: These shoes always run 1/2 size smaller than others, when ordering always best to get a half size larger. Great shoes, price and rapid delivery, thank you very much and look forward to purchasing from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I received the exact item that I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: I received what I ordered, just a little bit smaller than my other tazon 6 (same sneakers) Same as description, very good quality item. Same as description and photos. I love this brand! Good job Puma!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my cousin for his Birthday. They fit him perfectly and he said the really looked great. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Laura W

customer_reviews.title: Bad Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 8.5 but I got these in a Size 9, they fit way too tight. I didn't try them on when I received them, shame on me, and now it's too late to send them back. They are a Nice looking shoe though.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Best sneaker ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd time I buy the same sneakers, I think that says it all. Very good fit and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Magaz

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this purchase, I normally will not purchase shoes online because I need to try them out but I took a chance with this and I couldn't be more happy with this product, it fits very good and is very comfortable. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fields55

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and look
customer_reviews.text: Love these Pumas. Fit and look great. Very comfortable. As I've commented previously on other reviews had to buy half size larger than my normal sneaker size for them to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: Order half size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Durable and comfortable. As with all Puma shoes I order half size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas roach

customer_reviews.title: Muy bonitos pero me quedaron pequeños
customer_reviews.text: I am in Guatemala, and now that they have arrived, they left me small, it would have to be half a size more. Returning it I get very expensive, there is a discount option to buy a new pair of identical shoes but 9.5 Us. The style of tennis is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Acd9056

customer_reviews.title: Puma Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love my Puma’s. Have received complements already about the design and color.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis E. Alfonso

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoe for me...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair and I feel that they are a good buy for the money...
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was worn for over 14+ hours--no issues! Saving fo another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband had a pair of these before and loved them. He was happy to be able to find them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my brother and he loves them: the look, the fit and the durability is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: Just got both pair of my Pumas today. The toe box was tight when first putting them on but don't fret I wore them around the house for about an hour and they loosened right up and I have plenty of room for my toes my shoes are size 12
customer_reviews.author: Bullshark

customer_reviews.title: Zero Stars
customer_reviews.text: Updated review: I bought the shoes two months ago and the cushion inside the shoe is falling apart. Very disappointed nice shoes. still a little small
customer_reviews.author: anonymousq22

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe I've ever owned. I wear them every day. Probably buy another pair soon.
customer_reviews.text: Best shoe I've ever owned. I wear them every day. Probably buy another pair soon.
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: Good for feet
customer_reviews.text: This fit my foot great. I love my air max , but these are great since I walk atleast 8 miles a day while at work. I work in a mall if that helps. Lots of walking
customer_reviews.author: Billy I.

customer_reviews.title: Look nice, but tight.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look really nice, but they feel a little tight for size 9. Other than that, I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: Wrong shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the shoes I received but they weren't the ones I ordered. In fact they were of a cheaper value. I'm to busy to return them. Please make sure my next order is what I selected if you in fact read these post.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Cowart

customer_reviews.title: Very kool sneakers
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable fits as expected i am happy with it, For many years Puma has been my sneakers of choice because of their unique style and appearance i will buy again and my older ones i will give away to less fortunate people in my area because i take great care of all my shoes so they still look new
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Ettienne

customer_reviews.title: I love this sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great quality sneaker for the price! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicky Nicole

customer_reviews.title: great shoe for the money
customer_reviews.text: fits great feels soft and comfortable, great shoe for the money
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe but a little on the tight side.
customer_reviews.text: I like the style but the shoe is a little narrow. As I wear them they are becoming more comfortable. So overall I think they are a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: D1n9e12

customer_reviews.title: Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Great looking sneaker, but it was much narrower than I expected. I had to send them back. Unfortunately they aren't offering wide sizes.
customer_reviews.author: CT review

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again - great shoe design!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very nice - however - I ordered another o poi air of Pumas same size but they are not as tight - further - it seems the right shoe is shorter than left - that may be my foot - overall quality and workmanship is excellent - I get compliments all day long!
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Every man needs a pair!
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my husband. The fit was excellent as when we read the reviews, we understood these shoes had to be broken into. Nice sturdy shoes, thick his quality material and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa X.

customer_reviews.title: Great support!
customer_reviews.text: I am a women's size ten and I buy the 8.5 for a perfect workout shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Cool k
customer_reviews.text: The style was the main attraction. The comfort was expected.
customer_reviews.author: frank colon

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoe looks good and feels great. Fits to my size fine.
customer_reviews.author: Richard P.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: These are a great shoe that are a perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Roy E. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot, it’s just what I wanted👍
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Nice Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love the design but the toe box area is narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Martak

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look, fit and stability are perfect for my training and wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Love Puma
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. A bit on the loose side, but not complaining. Fits and feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Negron

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: Get a size or two bigger they kind a look like golf shoes in person too tight very uncomfortable overall
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Vondeck

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if authentic
customer_reviews.text: I don't think these are authentic because the design is slightly off; similar but not quite. Sending them back!
customer_reviews.author: J. ins

customer_reviews.title: initial opinion is below expectations new brand for me so ...
customer_reviews.text: initial opinion is below expectations new brand for me so i need some time to see how it performs at the gym hopefull but cautious
customer_reviews.author: KEITH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sneakers great price
customer_reviews.text: Great looking sneakers exclent fit great price what's not to like
customer_reviews.author: Vic R

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very beautiful, they have been worn for a while, the feet feel very comfortable, and the quality is good, I like it very much! I want to buy this brand of shoes next time.
customer_reviews.author: ping jian xiao

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase so far!
customer_reviews.text: The price was right, the product was right and the shipping process was good.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C. Strickland

customer_reviews.title: These shoes fit snug but very comfortable. The soles are soft yet due and stable ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit snug but very comfortable. The soles are soft yet due and stable to support weight. I work 12hr shifts in a hospital in these and I feel very comfortable. Comfy and stylish. Ordering another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Fit True
customer_reviews.text: These fit true to size - decent cross training/casual shoe. If you plan on doing a lot of running, get something better suited to a running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy1018

customer_reviews.title: Love them-But they were a little tight
customer_reviews.text: I really love this Puma tennis. However, they were a little too tight. Once I stretched them using a shoe stretcher, they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Cam'S

customer_reviews.title: They feel great on my feet.
customer_reviews.text: Like the way they fit and comfortable feeling, also they look really good
customer_reviews.author: G. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: It fit as expected. I have issues wearing it so far. Thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Damion Atherton

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Cell Surin 2 FM Cross-Trainer Shoe
product_meta.description: The cell surin 2 offers a fresh look within the 10cell family. This casual athletic running style offers a lighter, sleeker and modern feel while continuing with the successful heritage look on visible technology. Perfect to wear before, during, and after a workout.
feature_bullets: Clean Synthetic leather upper with perforations for breathability.
